--- title: Sample Tree keywords: fastai sidebar: home_sidebar summary: "A tree data structure to count circuit and subset selection in protocol runs" description: "A tree data structure to count circuit and subset selection in protocol runs" nb_path: "05c_sampler.sample_tree.ipynb" ---
{% raw %}
{% endraw %} {% raw %}
{% endraw %}

For subset sampling we need a new data structure to keep track of the circuit and circuit-subsets we are sampling from per protocol run. The natural structure for this problem is a Tree which we call SampleTree, populated with so-called CountNodes:

{% raw %}

class CountNode[source]

CountNode(name, parent=None, children=None, counts=0, ckey=None, is_deterministic=False, is_fail=False) :: NodeMixin

{% endraw %} {% raw %}
{% endraw %} {% raw %}

class SampleTree[source]

SampleTree(root=None)

{% endraw %} {% raw %}
{% endraw %}
